content.raw: UI detail: when a new topic comes up, it doesn't appear on the list until you close and reopen the dialog

content.raw: ya I don't know if there's an efficient solution other than polling to get all advertised topics and manually checking to see if anything's changed. It would be nice to have something like the introspection functionality that signals if there're new changes. We also probably don't want to spend time implementing new features for the current transport layer though. I'll ticket an issue for the palette topic refresh issue for now
content.html: ya I don't know if there's an efficient solution other than polling to get all advertised topics and manually checking to see if anything's changed. It would be nice to have something like the introspection functionality that signals if there're new changes. We also probably don't want to spend time implementing new features for the current transport layer though. I'll ticket an issue for the palette topic refresh issue for now

content.raw:
Got a crash:

1. Insert a hokuyo

1. Open plot dialog

1. Search for "hokuyo intensities"

1. Drag that into the plot and gazebo crashes with:

~~~
[libprotobuf FATAL google/protobuf/generated_message_reflection.cc:83] Protocol Buffer reflection usage error:
  Method      : google::protobuf::Reflection::GetDouble
  Message type: gazebo.msgs.LaserScan
  Field       : gazebo.msgs.LaserScan.intensities
  Problem     : Field is repeated; the method requires a singular field.
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'google::protobuf::FatalException'
  what():  Protocol Buffer reflection usage error:
  Method      : google::protobuf::Reflection::GetDouble
  Message type: gazebo.msgs.LaserScan
  Field       : gazebo.msgs.LaserScan.intensities
  Problem     : Field is repeated; the method requires a singular field.
escalating to SIGKILL on server
~~~
content.html:
Got a crash:

  1. Insert a hokuyo

  2. Open plot dialog

  3. Search for "hokuyo intensities"

  4. Drag that into the plot and gazebo crashes with:

[libprotobuf FATAL google/protobuf/generated_message_reflection.cc:83] Protocol Buffer reflection usage error:
  Method      : google::protobuf::Reflection::GetDouble
  Message type: gazebo.msgs.LaserScan
  Field       : gazebo.msgs.LaserScan.intensities
  Problem     : Field is repeated; the method requires a singular field.
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'google::protobuf::FatalException'
  what():  Protocol Buffer reflection usage error:
  Method      : google::protobuf::Reflection::GetDouble
  Message type: gazebo.msgs.LaserScan
  Field       : gazebo.msgs.LaserScan.intensities
  Problem     : Field is repeated; the method requires a singular field.
escalating to SIGKILL on server

content.raw: I just checked that pose is being handled
content.html: I just checked that pose is being handled

content.raw:
I just checked plotting: vector2d and color messages and they both work. Here's what I did:

- Vector2d: Plot `~/visual?p=/geometry/plane/size/x`  then insert a ground plane

- Color: Plot `~/visual?p=/material/diffuse/r` then insert a model that has a material with `<diffuse>` sdf element (I made one using the model editor).
content.html:
I just checked plotting: vector2d and color messages and they both work. Here's what I did:

  • Vector2d: Plot ~/visual?p=/geometry/plane/size/x then insert a ground plane

  • Color: Plot ~/visual?p=/material/diffuse/r then insert a model that has a material with <diffuse> sdf element (I made one using the model editor).

content.raw: Cool, thanks for checking this. I was expecting these messages to appear here along with Vector3d and Quaternion, but I guess I should take a closer look at the code.
content.html: Cool, thanks for checking this. I was expecting these messages to appear here along with Vector3d and Quaternion, but I guess I should take a closer look at the code.
